name: ChordWizard Song
summary: An SNGX file contains a song created by Songtrix, an application used to learn about and create music. It contains a song composition, which includes the notes, segments, credits, lyrics, chords, and structure of the song. SNGX files replaced .CWS files with the release of Songtrix 4.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: SNGX file open in ChordWizard Songtrix 4
images.alt: SNGX file open in ChordWizard Songtrix 4
